comment: I am preparing for TN TRB.... TQ VERY MUCH
amazing content ! i just loved it! Thank you sir

I am preparing for ugc net and ur way of teaching is excellent. It makes the topics easy to understand. Can u plz upload the operating system rest lectures ( including deadlock, memory management.....).
presentation and teaching skills are just awesome  🏆🏆🏆🎖🏅👍

But I didn't find lot of topics in os like deadlock .can u tell me where can I find those ???
I think I'm watching the video for the first time now. Thank you
They have those lectures on their app. But you have to pay in order to learn those.
this is a long serie. I think it would take quite a long time for them to finish
You can find those in their app
